Obtaining a Licence

# Heavy Vehicle Driver's Licence (Classes 1, 2 and 3)

There are 3 main licence classes to drive heavy vehicles: Class 1 to drive combinations of road vehicles; Class 2 to drive buses with a seating capacity of more than 24 passengers; and Class 3 to drive trucks.

Last update: July 16, 2025

## Safety first, on the road and online

We are committed to protecting your personal information and privacy. That's why, when we collect data, we follow a [Policy on Privacy](https://saaq.gouv.qc.ca/en/policies/privacy) that is responsible and transparent.
